divs: Sighting DetailsI work for Sony in Tijuana Mexico and it was around 4:30am and as I and a coworker were walking out to the dock area to take a picture of a loaded container he noticed a brite light in the night sky he called me over to where he was standing to show me what he was seeing i walked over and looked up and saw a brite purple light and it was zig zaging leaveing whit dotes on every turn it made we procedded to take a picture of it and when we snaped the first picture the light dissapierd as if it saw that we took a picture of it we were both amazed on how fast it was moving and how fast it dissapierd.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Tijuana
There were no other sightings in Tijuana on or around February 15th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
